explains: n. 消化；消化能力；（使用酶或溶剂的）分解，提炼
wordGroup: anaerobic digestion 厌氧消化；厌气消化
acid digestion 酸分解；酸性消化
aerobic digestion 好氧消化；需氧消化
digestion tank 老化器；消化槽

sentences.en: No liquids are served with meals because they interfere with digestion.
sentences.cn: 上菜时不提供饮料，因为会妨碍消化。

sentences.en: Digestion begins in the mouth with the action of saliva.
sentences.cn: 消化是在口腔中唾液的作用下开始的。

sentences.en: With larger stomachs and slower digestion, you don't need as much energy.
sentences.cn: 有了更大的胃和更慢的消化速度，你就不需要这么多能量了。
